title: Anyone Interested In Being In Videos :D?
body:
I make little YouTube videos and I want to take serious now. All you need is a decent microphone. "DECENT" No feedback :< Makes for terrible editing.

If you're interested in what kind of videos I make; I make funny highlight videos!

You can watch my videos here and see if you want to be part of the group! :)

NEED RAIDCALL/SKYPE :'D

Also ADD ME PLEASE :)

[Click ME!- Youtube Channel](http://www.youtube.com/kamisandbox)
